function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Develop standardized protocols for uv-c irradiation based on different substrates and media","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Optimize uv-c exposure and develop methods to enhance penetration in concentrated suspensions","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct further experimental studies to gather more data on uv-c irradiation of airborne coronaviruses","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct specific studies to determine the accurate z value for sars-cov-2 in air","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Conduct extensive simulations and empirical studies to validate the performance of the uvgi system","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Conduct additional studies with the actual virus to validate findings","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implement measures to improve room air mixing, such as ventilation system upgrades","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Supplement upper-room uvgi systems with ceiling mounted fans or other devices to promote necessary air movement","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promote good room air mixing and ensure that larger aerosol particles receive the required uv irradiation dose","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Carefully design air movement in rooms to eliminate stagnant regions and maximize air movement through the uv field","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proper installation and regular maintenance of uvgi systems.","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improvement of ventilation system, use of upper-room uvgi.","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct further experimental work to determine the true value of the upper-room uv susceptibility constant for sars-cov-2","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use computational fluid dynamics cfd to assess the limitations of the technology with respect to room air convection currents","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Combining uvgi with other effective interventions such as ventilation and filtration to ensure comprehensive coverage of the building.","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Development of anti-sars-cov-2 coating to reduce viability of the virus on solids","category":"Materials selection","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Thorough testing and validation of coatings for long-term virucidal potency","category":"Materials selection","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Research and testing to identify chemical groups that effectively inactivate sars-cov-2","category":"Materials selection","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use alternative eco-friendly pesticides and antifoulants, study the long-term effects of exposure to cuprous oxide","category":"Materials selection","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Conduct further research on the systemic effects of copper exposure, public education on potential health risks","category":"Materials selection","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Further research on the effectiveness and safety of cu 2 o particle coatings, regulatory scrutiny of the application of cu 2 o in public spaces","category":"Materials selection","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implement strict hygiene protocols and provide proper protective equipment","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of effective disinfectants and regular disinfection protocols","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Strict cleaning and disinfection of equipment after each use","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Provide training on safe handling of plasma cleaning, use protective clothing and equipment","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of appropriate containment measures and biosafety protocols","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use appropriate personal protective equipment ppe , work in a well-ventilated area, and follow safety guidelines for handling chemicals.","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use personal protective equipment ppe , work in a controlled environment, and follow safety guidelines for handling and testing cu2o films.","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Strict adherence to biosafety protocols, use of appropriate personal protective equipment ppe , and testing in controlled environments","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of coatings with similar or higher efficacy than cu 2 o/pu coating to ensure rapid inactivation of viruses.","category":"Materials selection","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Standardization of coating application and testing procedures to minimize variations in effectiveness.","category":"Materials selection","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Clear labeling and communication of coating ingredients to ensure proper understanding of antiviral effectiveness.","category":"Materials selection","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ensure consistent wettability of the cu 2 o/pu film to guarantee effective viral inactivation","category":"Materials selection","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Further research and validation of the biocidal mechanisms of cu 2 o compounds to ensure consistent and reliable virucidal activity","category":"Materials selection","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct thorough investigations into the virucidal activity of cu 2 o/pu film against specific viruses, including sars-cov-2, and publish findings for public health guidance","category":"Materials selection","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular verification of inactivation efficacy through control experiments","category":"Materials selection","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Strict containment protocols for handling and testing of stored samples","category":"Materials selection","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use more durable coating materials, implement regular inspection and maintenance","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Research and development of more effective antiviral coatings, implementation of additional protective measures","category":"Materials selection","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of porous coating of cu 2 o/pu to reduce infective titer of sars-cov-2","category":"Materials selection","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Not using amine and ammonium-based polymers for virus inactivation","category":"Materials selection","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular assessment and maintenance of the coating integrity","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement strict biosafety protocols, use proper personal protective equipment, and conduct research in a controlled environment such as a biosafety level 2 or higher laboratory.","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase access to affordable housing and financial support for low-income populations","category":"Shift controls (occupancy control of total users)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Equitable distribution of resources and support to affected communities","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement strategies to prevent housing displacement and provide support to displaced individuals","category":"Shift controls (occupancy control of total users)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement eviction moratoria and housing stabilization measures","category":"Shift controls (occupancy control of total users)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Enhance ventilation in indoor environments, enforce social distancing and hygiene practices","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improved housing stability and access to suitable housing","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improving shelter conditions, providing adequate living space per person","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"High"}]}
